text: Robert Jackson Robinson (April 26, 1927 â€“ February 8, 2022), nicknamed "Jack" or "Jackie", was an American Baptist pastor, theologian and college basketball player. He competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics, winning a gold medal. Robinson was born in Fort Worth, Texas. Robinson died on February 8, 2022 in Augusta, Georgia at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:American theologians Category:Medalists at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Point guards Category:Sportspeople from Fort Worth, Texas
title: Jackie Robinson (basketball, born 1927)
